rooms.description: You are in a small room with white walls. A door leads to the east and another locked door to the north.

characters.name: John
characters.dialogue: Hey there! Have you seen my key?
characters.description: John is your old time friend, he's a bit of a scatterbrain.

interactions.message: John notices your flashlight and remembers he left something behind the cabinet. He gives you a mysterious box.

spawnItem.name: Mysterious Box
spawnItem.description: A small box with intricate designs.

features.description: Resting against the room's stone-cold wall is a mysterious wooden cabinet.

interactions.message: Using the flashlight, you find a hidden compartment in the cabinet. Inside, there's a golden key.

spawnItem.name: Golden Key
spawnItem.description: A shiny golden key, it looks special.

features.description: A sturdy door leading north, it seems to be locked.

interactions.message: Using the golden key, you unlock the door to the north.

rooms.description: You are in a large hall with marble flooring. A door leads to the west.

items.name: Book
items.description: A thick old book titled 'Adventures of Yore'.

features.description: A grand painting of a landscape hangs on the wall.

interactions.message: You try the key on a hidden lock behind the painting, but nothing happens.

rooms.description: You've entered a mysterious chamber. The ambiance feels ancient and a hint of adventure lingers in the air.
